name: setting_up_a_db_and_connecting_to_express_server_assignment_1-
description: Imagine you are tasked with setting up a backend for a customer management system. The system's database is hosted on MongoDB, and you need to create a Node.js server using Express.js to interact with the database. Your job is to set up the server, connect it to MongoDB atlas, and ensure the connection status is logged appropriately.
